card_text: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Send 1 "Salamangreat" monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.$N●Target 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control that was Link Summoned using a monster with its same name as material; destroy cards your opponent controls, up to that monster's Link Rating.$NYou can only activate 1 "Salamangreat Rage" per turn.
